title: AIIMS Bathinda Jobs 2026 - Apply Online for Senior Palliative Medicine Doctor Posts
description: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences Bathinda (AIIMS Bathinda) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Senior Palliative Medicine Doctor Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, DNB, MD/MS, and Diploma can apply for the AIIMS Bathinda Jobs 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the educa...
